title: Animal House (1978) (John Belushi, Tim Matheson)
description:
NATIONAL LAMPOON'S ANIMAL HOUSE - 1978

  This is one of those movies that works for all the wrong reasons--disgusting, lowbrow, base humor that we are all far too sophisticated to find amusing. So, just don't tell anyone you still think it's a riot to watch John Belushi as the brutish Bluto slurp Jell-O or terrorize his less-aggressive fellow students. This crude parody of college life in the '60s spawned many imitations, but none could match the fresh-faced talent or bad taste of this huge box office success. This was the first of the National Lampoon movies. Keep an eye out for a very young Kevin Bacon in his first credited screen appearance.

  Starring: John Belushi, Tim Matheson, John Vernon, Peter Reigert, Karen Allen, Verna Bloom, Tom Hulce, Donald Sutherland.

  Directed by: John Landis.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 49min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 720 x 448
